definition: postulate (math.)/public facilities (abbr. for 公共設施|公共设施[gong1 gong4 she4 shi1])

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to set up/to arrange/to establish/to found/to display
(Tw) shared-facilities ratio (expressed as a percentage of the total floor space of a building)

sentences.english: Have a professional maintenance team, chip-level maintenance of all types of office equipment.
sentences.chinese: 拥有专业维修队伍，芯片级维修各类办公设备。

sentences.english: As a preamble , it is necessary to state some assumptions of the theory.
sentences.chinese: 作为导言，有必要陈述该理论的一些公设。

sentences.english: Two basic postulates and a hypothesis in circuit theory are provided.
sentences.chinese: 文中提出了电路理论的两个基本公设和一个假设。

sentences.english: To account for the linguistic system is to account for its postulated basic features.
sentences.chinese: 表述语言系统就是表述其公设性基本特征。

sentences.english: Rent unused space and office equipment to another business owner who needs it.
sentences.chinese: 将闲置的空间和办公设备出租给有需要的公司。

sentences.english: They receive cuts and bruises from office tools and furniture. They develop long-term injuries from repetitive work such as keyboarding.
sentences.chinese: 也有可能因办公家具或使用办公设备被割伤或擦伤。

sentences.english: Running your own office equipment also makes a big difference.
sentences.chinese: 而开动自己的办公设备就大不相同了。

sentences.english: Geometry is developed rigorously from a postulational base.
sentences.chinese: 从公设的基础上严谨地推演几何学。

sentences.english: A: That's the warehouse where the large items of office equipment are stored.
sentences.chinese: 那是仓库，用来贮存比较大的办公设备。

sentences.english: The latest office equipment is more type-functional.
sentences.chinese: 最新的办公设备更加多功能。

sentences.english: I'd like to speak to Mr. Hinman about some new office equipment.
sentences.chinese: 我想找亨曼先生谈谈有关办公设备的事。

sentences.english: All home office depreciable equipment meets the qualification.
sentences.chinese: 所有符合条件的家庭办公设备都可以折旧。

definition: Archimedes' method of exhaustion (an early form of integral calculus)
reductio ad absurdum/arguing by contradiction/also called 反證法|反证法
